virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.case_name: Virginia Edith Wambui vs Joash Ochieng Ougo & Another
virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.judge: Justice Gatembu Kairu, Justice Patrick Kiage, Justice Roselyn Nambuye
virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.summary: Landmark case on inheritance rights and succession law interpretation
virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.legal_principle: Surviving spouse's rights under intestacy laws
virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.key_facts: Dispute over inheritance rights between surviving spouse and deceased's relatives
virginia_edith_wambui_v_joash_ochieng_ou.decision: Court affirmed surviving spouse's rights under Law of Succession Act

mary_rono_v_joseph_rono_&_2_others.case_name: Mary Rono vs Joseph Rono & 2 Others
mary_rono_v_joseph_rono_&_2_others.summary: Case establishing principles for matrimonial property division
mary_rono_v_joseph_rono_&_2_others.legal_principle: Equal contribution principle in matrimonial property
mary_rono_v_joseph_rono_&_2_others.key_facts: Division of matrimonial property upon divorce
mary_rono_v_joseph_rono_&_2_others.decision: Property divided based on contribution and circumstances
